H0.text: Which bird is known in French as 'merle'. Song Thrush

H1.text: Which bird is known in French as 'merle'. Fieldfare

H2.text: Which bird is known in French as 'merle'. Redwing

H3.text: Which bird is known in French as 'merle'. BLACKBIRD

A4.text: The binomial name derives from two Latin words, turdus, 'thrush', and merula, 'blackbird', the latter giving rise to its French name, merle.
